gram "includes programs involving the dis¬
cussion of, or primarily designed to further
an appreciation or understanding of literature,
music, or fine arts, history, geography, and
the natural and social sciences; and programs

struct. "
CBR - CITIZENS BAND RADIO
A service is intended to provide for the use of
short distance radio communication facilities for
the business or personal activities of licensees,
for radio signalling and for control of remote
objects and devices such as model airplanes, and
garage door openers, etc.
CCR - CARRIER CURRENT RADIO
A system in which radio frequency energy is con¬
ducted from transmitter to receiver over a net of
wires, rather than through space. The trans-
